Location: Syntax:
Location Syntax:
new (Name) - Create a new location with a specified name
delete (ID) - Delete a location with the specified ID
edit (ID) <Parameter 1> <Value> <...> - Edit a location with the specified ID
update - Apply datafile changes
list - Get a list of locations
validate (ID) <Profile Name> - Validate location for buildings and colliders
debug <Profile Name> - Print minor debug information
show <Profile Name> - Show all positions
Location: Edit Syntax:
Location Edit Parameters:
move (x;y;z / here) - Move a location to the specified position
group (ID / reset) - Set group of a location or reset the group
Location: Unable To Parse Group: Unable to parse the entered group
Location: Removed: Location was removed from our database.
Location: Validation Format: Buildings valid: {buildings}; Colliders valid: {colliders}; Raycast valid: {raycast}
Location: Player Only: This is available only to in-game players.
